preqs: Students must have passed one of the following units: AFF2491, AFC2491, ACC2100.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB3050, ACC3600, ACF3491, ACG3040, ACG3050, ACW3040, ACW3050, AFC3120, AFF3491, AFG3040, AFG3050, AFW3040, AFW3050}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC2100, ACC2120, ACF2100, ACF2491, AFF2491} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit explores advanced financial accounting issues, building on knowledge and skills gained in earlier units in financial accounting. A range of theories used to assess accounting decisions, reporting practices and regulation are examined. The unit focuses on a number of contemporary accounting issues including: measurement, intangible assets, financial instruments, foreign currency transactions and integrated reporting.
